newsitem.title: DUBAI: BankWatch upgrades Saudi Investment Bank rating.
newsitem.headline: BankWatch upgrades Saudi Investment Bank rating.

text.p: New York-based Thomson BankWatch said on Monday it had upgraded its risk rating of Saudi Investment Bank and affirmed ratings of four other Saudi and two United Arab Emirates banks.

The ratings agency said in a statement it had upgraded Saudi Investment Bank's intra-country issuer rating to IC-A/B from IC-B, while affirming the Riyadh-based bank's short-term local currency debt rating at LC-1.
"The rating upgrade reflects prospects for continued improvement in earnings while maintaining a prudent lending discipline as well as strong reserves and capital," BankWatch said.
BankWatch affirmed Saudi Cairo Bank's intra-country issuer rating of IC-B/C and its short-term local currency debt rating of LC-1.

The agency also affirmed intra-country issuer ratings of IC-A and short-term local currency debt rating of LC-1 for the Arab National Bank, Saudi American Bank, Saudi British Bank as well as for Emirates Bank International.
It affirmed MashreqBank's intra-country issuer rating at IC-B/C and the Dubai-based bank's short-term local currency debt rating at LC-1, the statement said.
